nodes.text: A beralyx was a type of large, three-limbed reptile with a forked tail. During the Republic Dark Age, the Sith Lord Arkadia Calimondra owned a beralyx on the planet of Syned, and in 1032 BBY, she rode out on the creature to greet the Jedi Knight Kerra Holt and the mercenary Jarrow Rusher.
